timeline.name: The Idea
timeline.description: The idea of an app for the STEAM Center was sent via email to the STEAM Ambassadors sponsor.

timeline.name: First Application
timeline.description: The first application form to develop an app for the STEAM Center was sent out to STEAM Ambassadors and Computer Science club.

timeline.name: First General Meeting
timeline.description: The first meeting was held through Zoom, all selected applicants meeting for the first time and laying the foundation for the STEAM Center App â€” then unnamed.

timeline.name: Begin Phase 1
timeline.description: Phase 1 of the STEAM Center App project began with our first meeting via Zoom.

timeline.name: Website Design
timeline.description: The process of designing and branding the STEAM Center App website started.

timeline.name: End of Phase 1
timeline.description: The last meeting, via Zoom, of the school year hammering out all the details in preparation of Phase 2 next year.

timeline.name: Presentation
timeline.description: We held a presentation with Mr. Labue, the principal of the STEAM Center, and some administration members, introducing Phase 1 of our project.

timeline.name: Site Going Live
timeline.description: The STEAM Life Website went live!

timeline.name: Begin Phase 2
timeline.description: Phase 2 began with our first meeting in the STEAM Center MPR.

timeline.name: STEAM Center Fall Festival
timeline.description: The STEAM Life team hosted a booth at the Fall Festival.

timeline.name: Logos
timeline.description: Official logos for STEAM Life were approved and decided upon.

timeline.name: Meeting With Admin
timeline.description: Another presentation was held about the viability of a STEAM Life App and our progress thus far.
